    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rat Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1305) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you. You can cast [_animal messenger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=11) once per day as a primal innate spell. When you do, the animal that responds is always a rat. If there are no rats within range, the spell is lost.
name: Rat Magic
